Game Features

Play this new take on Mahjong Solitare and help a young girl find her lost parents.
Master thousands of immersive levels by matching over 1800 types of tiles in 43 different tilesets.
Use the four groundbreaking powerups to earn collectibles and display them as you restore the family home.
Enjoy gorgeous graphics and rich sounds as you travel around the world.
Enjoy regular free updates with new levels, tilesets and more.
